name: Visible Property 2
description:
Visible Property 2 will let you name your layer to control value. It will update the text follow reference's properties whenever you call plugin.


[Note] Plugin will update only element you select. If you don't choose anything, the plugin will update everything.


üêº Video Tutorial


  • Youtube: https://youtu.be/PEC56gILBMA


üê∑ How it works:


  1. Define reference element by add "#" in front of layer name. For example #color
  2. Defile text element you want to update (#reference + . + method) For example #color.fill, #color.fillRGB, #color.height etc.
  3. call plugin by "cmd + /" -> "visible property 2"


Tip. You can reference to the parent layer by using "##Parent" or "##TopParent" without layer name ex.

  • ##Parent.name or ##Parent.fill
  • ##TopParent.name or ##TopParent.fill


ü¶Å Properties:


Fill

  • fill -> #123456 78%
  • fillRGB -> rgba(123, 456, 789, 1)
  • fillHSL -> hsla(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • fillHSB -> hsba(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • fillStyle -> DarkBlue
  • fillStyleDescription -> The Description


Stroke

  • stroke -> #123456
  • strokeRGB -> rgba(123, 456, 789, 1)
  • strokeHSL -> hsla(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • strokeHSB -> hsba(123, 456, 789, 0.1)
  • strokeStyle -> DarkBlue
  • strokeStyleDescription -> The Description


Text

  • font -> Roboto
  • fontWeight -> Bold
  • fontSize -> 12
  • paragraphIndent -> 12
  • paragraphSpace -> 12
  • letterSpace -> 12 or 12%
  • lineHeight -> 12 or 12%
  • textStyle -> Body
  • textStyleDescription -> The Description


Size

  • height -> 32
  • width -> 64


Layer

  • name -> layer name


Component

  • description -> component description



[Note] Support Gradient only default Start, Stop position
